import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Header from '../Header/Header'; import './ProductConstructor.css'; import FileUploader from './FileUploader'; function ProductConstructor({ terms }) { const [productName, setProductName] = useState(''); const [productDescription, setProductDescription] = useState(''); const [category, setCategory] = useState([]); const [color, setColor] = useState([]); const [length, setLength] = useState(''); const [weight, setWeight] = useState(''); const [stoneOrigin, setStoneOrigin] = useState(''); const [metalType, setMetalType] = useState(''); const [stoneSize, setStoneSize] = useState(''); const [production, setProduction] = useState(''); const [price, setPrice] = useState(''); const [salePrice, setSalePrice] = useState(''); const [discount, setDiscount] = useState(0); const [articleNumber, setArticleNumber] = useState(''); const [inStock, setInStock] = useState(''); const [buttonColor, setButtonColor] = useState(''); // const [additionalProperties, setAdditionalProperties] = useState([]); // const [favorite, setFavorite] = useState(false); // const [status, setStatus] = useState('draft'); const [radioValue, setRadioValue] = useState(''); const [attachedFiles, setAttachedFiles] = useState([]); const [isUnique, setIsUnique] = useState(0); const [isIrid, setIsIrid] = useState(0); const [isMinimalism, setIsMinimalism] = useState(0); const [isMasterpiece, setIsMasterpiece] = useState(0); const stoneTags = terms.tags; console.log(stoneTags); // console.log(attachedFiles) // console.log(terms) function handleFileAttachment(files) { setAttachedFiles(files); // const fileNames = files.map(file => file.name); это не работает // setAttachedFiles(fileNames); } function handleButtonColorChoosing(color) { setButtonColor(color); // console.log(color); } const handleFormSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); }; function handleCategoryChange(e) { setCategory(e.target.value); // они будут просто переключаться, разобраться } function handleColorChange(e) { setColor(e.target.value); } return ( <>
{/*

Добавление и редактирование товара

*/}
setProductName(e.target.value)} />
